name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Harry Remembers - Web Note & Screenshot Taker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A revolution in the web note and screenshot taking. 🔥 
From now on, Harry remembers your notes/memos and screenshots across the…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A revolution in the web note and screenshot taking. 🔥 
From now on, Harry remembers your notes/memos and screenshots across the web!

Quick & Personal Note taking. A perfect tool for taking quick notes inside your browser with a single click. Take a screenshot and save it with a note in one second, Harry will remind you of your note and your previously taken screenshot whenever you are back to the same page.

Key Features:
✅ Easily save memos everywhere on the web, on any page! 📝
✅ Get reminded of them when you're back to the page 🧠
✅ Take and save a screenshot of any part of the current page 📷
✅ Have a universal searchable preview of all your saved memos 🌎
✅ Save as many memos as you want for each website 📚

No sign up or login needed. Harry recognizes you automatically through chrome, and provides you with your saved notes any time.

______________________


Harry Remembers has been crafted for everyone. Whether you are an entrepreneur, an employee (a recruiter for example), a student, a teacher,  you will surely love it.

Want to have a preview of all your taken notes / screenshots so far across all websites? Click on the extension icon then click on "All my saved notes", you will have an excellent preview of your history of saved notes, and you can easily filter them.

If you are not able to find extension icon after installation:
Click Pin icon inside the jigsaw-extensions icon. (This jigsaw-extensions icon is on the right-top of the browser), then click on Harry!

We’re constantly working on updates and improvements to make your HarryRemembers experience even better. If you have questions or feedback, we would love to hear from you at contact@tastola.com.

Cheers! Happy note taking.
